huffman - package huffman
 
Huffman - Class in huffman
The main class which specifies an input and an output file for compression or decompression, depending on user input (to be implemented).

HuffmanTree - Class in huffman.datastructures
Class that builds a Huffman tree and supplies the encodings generated from traversing it
